trans-unit.source: Provides a reusable <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UserControl"></xref> object for editing <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um reutilizável <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UserControl"> </xref> objeto para edição <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor> class provides a user interface for editing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> elements of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> objects that are referenced by several different properties of controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor>classe fornece uma interface do usuário para editar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>elementos de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>objetos que são referenciados por várias propriedades diferentes de controles em tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: The ParameterEditorUserControl class encapsulates most of the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor>.
trans-unit.target: A classe ParameterEditorUserControl encapsula a maioria das funcionalidades de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor> consists of an enclosing form that holds the ParameterEditorUserControl, and **OK** and **Cancel** buttons.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor>consiste em um formulário de delimitador que contém o ParameterEditorUserControl e **Okey** e **Cancelar** botões.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl.AddParameters%2A> method adds an array of existing parameters to the ParameterEditorUserControl.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl.AddParameters%2A>método adiciona uma matriz de parâmetros existentes para o ParameterEditorUserControl.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl.AddParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl.ClearParameters%2A> method removes all parameters from the ParameterEditorUserControl.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl.ClearParameters%2A>método Remove todos os parâmetros do ParameterEditorUserControl.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl.ClearParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl.GetParameters%2A> method gets all parameters from the ParameterEditorUserControl.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl.GetParameters%2A>método obtém todos os parâmetros do ParameterEditorUserControl.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl.GetParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl.SetAllowCollectionChanges%2A> method controls whether additions and deletions can be made to the parameters in the ParameterEditorUserControl.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl.SetAllowCollectionChanges%2A>método controla se as adições e exclusões podem ser feitas para os parâmetros de ParameterEditorUserControl.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl.SetAllowCollectionChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl"></xref> class using the specified <xref:System.IServiceProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl"> </xref> classe usando o <xref:System.IServiceProvider>.</xref:System.IServiceProvider> especificado

trans-unit.source: The ParameterEditorUserControl constructor initializes the component controls of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl> object, initializes UI elements, connects events for the individual component editors, and adds the component editors to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> collection for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl>.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de ParameterEditorUserControl inicializa os controles de componente do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl>objeto, inicializa os elementos de interface do usuário, se conecta a eventos para os editores de componente individual, e adiciona os editores de componente para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>coleção para <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IServiceProvider> interface to the current design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IServiceProvider>interface para o host de design atual, como [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: Adds an array of existing parameters to the editor.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma matriz de parâmetros existentes para o editor.

trans-unit.source: The AddParameters method adds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> elements of `parameters` to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl> object.
trans-unit.target: O método AddParameters adiciona o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>elementos de `parameters` para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: If there is more than one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> element, the AddParameters selects the first one in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: Se houver mais de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>elemento, o AddParameters seleciona o primeiro em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: Then the AddParameters refreshes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control and raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.ParametersChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, atualiza o AddParameters o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle e gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.ParametersChanged>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.ParametersChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> array of existing parameters to add to the editor.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"> </xref> matriz de parâmetros existentes para adicionar o Editor.

trans-unit.source: Removes all parameters from the editor.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os parâmetros do editor.

trans-unit.source: The ClearParameters method removes the parameters from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl> object.
trans-unit.target: O método ClearParameters remove os parâmetros a partir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Then the ClearParameters refreshes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control and raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.ParametersChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, atualiza o ClearParameters o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle e gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.ParametersChanged>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.ParametersChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Gets all parameters from the editor.
trans-unit.target: Obtém todos os parâmetros do editor.

trans-unit.source: The GetParameters method populates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> array with all parameters from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl>.
trans-unit.target: O método GetParameters preenche uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>matriz com todos os parâmetros do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle em <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> array of all parameters from the editor.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"> </xref> matriz de todos os parâmetros do editor.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl.ParametersChanged"></xref> event when the state of a parameter in the editor changes.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl.ParametersChanged"> </xref> evento quando muda o estado de um parâmetro no editor.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A origem do evento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>objeto que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any parameter or one of the parameter's properties is changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando qualquer parâmetro ou uma das propriedades do parâmetro é alterada.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether all the parameters in the editor are configured.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se todos os parâmetros no editor estão configurados.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all parameters in the editor are fully configured; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se todos os parâmetros no editor sejam configurados; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether additions and deletions can be made to the values in the editor.
trans-unit.target: Controla se as adições e exclusões podem ser feitas para os valores no editor.

trans-unit.source: The SetAllowCollectionChanges method controls whether additions and deletions can be made to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl> object.
trans-unit.target: O método SetAllowCollectionChanges controla se as adições e exclusões podem ser feitas para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>elemento o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>

trans-unit.source: The SetAllowCollectionChanges enables or disables the Up, Down, Add, and Delete buttons but it does not affect the editing of individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> elements.
trans-unit.target: O SetAllowCollectionChanges habilita ou desabilita a acima, abaixo, adicionar, e botões excluir mas não afeta a edição de um indivíduo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>elementos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether additions and deletions can be made to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref> being edited.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Boolean>que indica se as adições e exclusões podem ser feitas para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"> </xref> que está sendo editado.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Provides metadata for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece metadados para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterEditorUserControl"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A type descriptor provider object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de provedor de descritor de tipo.
